sentence: "Vance’s decline follows a $2 million-plus TV ad campaign from the Club for Growth and USA Freedom Fund, outside groups that are backing Vance rival Josh Mandel, which have portrayed Vance as an anti-Trump figure," writes Politico.
author: Brad Reed
title: JD Vance's campaign is going down in flames -- and his pollster warns he needs a 'course correction ASAP'

sentence: The invitation DEBATE DEBACLE — Ohio GOP Senate candidate JOSH MANDEL and Dem candidate MORGAN HARPER participated in a debate Monday evening.
title: POLITICO Playbook: Today’s conundrum: What’s an ‘invasion’?

sentence: Sources told NBC News Thursday that the president is on the verge of endorsing the Hillbilly Elegy author, but other Republicans including rival candidate Josh Mandel are fighting hard to prevent it.
author: Rob Quinn
title: Ohio Republicans Are Trying to Stop a Trump Endorsement
